alert.note: Alert for Blue Earth; Faribault; Le Sueur; Martin; Nicollet (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 11 at 3:01AM CST until January 13 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Steady snow tonight through Friday night with total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Nicollet, Le Sueur, Blue Earth, Martin and Faribault Counties. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 6 AM CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero will develop and could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Expect slippery roads and slow travel. Have winter clothes and a charged cell phone with you in your vehicle. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.

area.areaDesc: Blue Earth; Faribault; Le Sueur; Martin; Nicollet
